channel.title: A few questions
channel.description:
Hi!
Im sjoerd and im 12 years old. Please dont ban me on the forums because i can speak nice English and i want sure make an nice Pserver. My questions are:
Q 1. My character attacks very strange. How i can fix this? Q 2. How i set the make-over-mage so that she can change me into an girl? ;) (It looks nice with Veracs) Q 3. How i set the shop-weirdo's so that i can put my stuff into it? (Like in Varrock, that man who sell armours. Can i put Dragon stuff or like that on it?) Q 4. The mini-games, how you fix it? Q 5. How you climb ladders? Q 6. Evry half-hour my server crashes. Its gets an connection error and i most make a new server. This is strange people. Anyone know how to fix this? Q 7. How do you let your NPC walk? Q 8. How you open doors?
You can make an tutorial how i put the scripts on it, and you must post the codes. I hope you do it both. And please no **** virusses.
Thanks anyway for read this and very much thanks if you help me! :cool:

item.title: A few questions
